display_help: Logging out in a Police Station will earn you an Experience Point bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours. After 100 hours of logged out time you will earn the Law Enforcer Day Job badge that will enhance the Experience Point bonus granted by logging out here.
display_target_help: Logging out in a Police Station will earn you an Experience Point bonus after mission completion for a short time. The more time spent logged out, the longer the duration will last, up to a maximum of two hours.
